'''High-Frequency Whirling Assault''' is an [[Character Card Elemental Skill|Elemental Skill]] for [[Ruin Guard (Character Card)|Ruin Guard]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

This skill is executed automatically 1 turn after [[Spiral Close-In]].
